description: This view combines historical and current comments for SmartData element values.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the SmartData element value.

columns.name: UPDATE_NUM
columns.description: This column groups together rows of data that were stored together. A higher UPDATE_NUM means a more recent update.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this update. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.

columns.name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for the SmartData element value.

columns.name: LATEST_COMMENT_YN
columns.description: This columns returns 'Y' if this line is a current comment (i.e, if the data is coming from CONCEPT_COMMENT) and 'N' if it's a historical comment (i.e, if the data is coming from ELEM_VAL_PREV_CMT.)

columns.name: COMMENT_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the SmartData element comment was entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements.

columns.name: COMMENT_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the SmartData element comment was entered by a user through a SmartForm, SmartTool or other documentation tool that files discrete data to SmartData elements in the UTC timezone.

columns.name: COMMENT_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who entered the SmartData element comment for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.
